response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, I believe its true value exceeds $10,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this fantastic opportunity to elevate your collection or experience. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your possession.", "product_price": 9500}
